sense.def:
To disturb someone
pomeni prekiniti tisto, kar nekdo drug počne, in tako povzročiti nevšečnosti.

seg.quote: If she's asleep, don't disturb her.

sense.def:
Če nekaj
disturbs someone
, povzroči, da je nekdo vznemirjen ali zaskrbljen.

seg.quote: I was disturbed by some of the speeches.

sense.def:
To disturb something
pomeni spremeniti položaj ali zunanjost nečesa.

seg.quote: The sand had not been disturbed.
